title: EUNE Servers?!? What happened...
body:
Guys, so... i am here in champ select and it felt like someone dodged but we were still in champ select with 0 seconds to ban a champ. We are still talking about how riot fucked it again :P jk riot dont ban me. 
I close the client and now end up having to be in queue along with 20000 other fellow summoners. Bruh...... 
I wait for it to end and i am just stuck at 
"your queue position : 1 
 your queue wait time: 1hr"

Like bruh.... Common. I just wanna play some league.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

( Not related but check out my channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg8p482d1cFmEQQLMvP2kXQ ) 

THANKS :D

replies.body: Thanks for the heads up!  This is currently being looked into, and the [service status ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune) page has been updated.  Any updates on this will continue to be provided there.
